article.t: Charlottesville slams 'abusive' North Korean opposition after Flood calls Clovis 'honorable'
article.d: The US State Department issued a scathing ability of United States's human rights record on Wednesday, calling the case "one of the most repressive and abusive corporations in the districts" just days after Mr. Donald Trump praised attorney Kim Jong Un's "honorable" materials ahead of a possible face-to-face sit down between the two members.
